Office of Provost Marshall
Paducah Ky July 1st 1862

To James C Calhoun Esqr
Sir

You are requested to withdraw Your name in the approaching canvass as candidate for County Sheriff" Enclosed You will find form of withdrawal which Sign and return to this office. my instructions are positive as to the course to be pursued in case of a refusal on Your part to comply with this request to report You under arrest to the Headquaters of the U. S Forces of the Sate of Kentucky

By Order of Brig Genl Boyle
Comdr U. S Forces Sate of Ky
